missingness_notes: Typically complete; verify duplicates and missing IDs
needs_confirmation: Confirm actual column name and whether stable across waves (same id at baseline and 12m)

allowed_values_or_coding: If factor: baseline,m12 (preferred). If numeric: baseline=0; 12m=1
missingness_notes: May be missing if wide format or if some participants lack follow-up
needs_confirmation: Confirm current coding (factor levels vs numeric 0/1) and exact labels used (baseline/m12 or 12m)

allowed_values_or_coding: 0=Ei FOF, 1=FOF; if factor labels are used, keep explicit labels (Ei FOF/FOF)
missingness_notes: May be missing if source question unanswered; define how to handle UNKNOWN/NA
needs_confirmation: Confirm whether FOF_status is baseline-only or time-varying

derivation_formula: Composite measure already standardized to z-score (definition external)
missingness_notes: May be missing if any required components missing; document imputation if used
needs_confirmation: Confirm how Composite_Z is constructed (components, standardization reference, direction), and whether already long-format across time

missingness_notes: Usually complete; check if measured only at baseline and carried forward
needs_confirmation: Confirm whether age is baseline age only; if long format at 12m, confirm whether age updates or remains baseline

allowed_values_or_coding: UNKNOWN coding; recommend factor with explicit labels (e.g., male/female/other)
missingness_notes: May include missing/unknown category; keep explicit missing coding if present
needs_confirmation: Confirm exact coding values in dataset (e.g., 0/1, 1/2, 'M'/'F') and how to treat unknown

derivation_formula: BMI = weight_kg / (height_m^2) if not already provided
missingness_notes: May be missing if weight/height missing; document whether computed or recorded
needs_confirmation: Confirm whether BMI column exists directly; if derived, confirm source columns for weight and height and their units

derivation_formula: Direct from source dataset or recode
missingness_notes: Often has missing values; document handling (e.g., NA as missing, not a level)
needs_confirmation: Confirm variable name and response scale (e.g., 1-5) and direction (higher=better?)
Confirm whether Composite_Z0 exists in source data or is derived during ingest
Confirm that '2' corresponds to 12 kk in this project

derivation_formula: Delta_Composite_Z = Composite_Z2 - Composite_Z0 per R/functions/io.R and R/functions/checks.R
missingness_notes: Missing if either baseline or follow-up missing; must be NA if one timepoint absent
needs_confirmation: Confirm whether delta is used in reporting and the follow-up timepoint

allowed_values_or_coding: Model uses: Composite_Z, time, FOF_status, age, sex, BMI, id
derivation_formula: Ensure these column names exist exactly; otherwise map old->new names in a separate mapping file
needs_confirmation: Confirm exact dataset column names: any variants like ID vs id, Time vs time, FOF vs FOF_status, CompositeZ vs Composite_Z
